Diplomatic Briefing
We have promised {1_civname} that we will not settle near them ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to settle near them ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to settle near them
We have promised {1_civname} that we will not excavate in their lands ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to not excavate in their lands ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to not excavate in their lands
We have promised {1_civname} that we will no longer spy on them ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to stop spying on them({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to stop spying on them
We have promised {1_civname} that we will keep our troops away from their borders ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to keep our troops away from their borders ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to keep our troops away from their borders
We have promised {1_civname} that we will not send our missionaries to their cities ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to spread our religion to their people ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to spread our religion to their people
Founding a city here will break our promise to {1_civname} ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to settle here ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to settle here
Excavating here will mean breaking our promise to {1_civname} ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to not excavate here ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to not excavate here
We have promised that we will no longer spy on {1_civname} ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to stop spying on them ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to stop spying on them
{1_civname} may view our promise to move stay away from their borders as already broken
We must move some of our troops away from the {1_civadj} border IMMEDIATELY if we are not to break our promise ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
We must move some of our troops away from the {1_civadj} border within {3_turns}[ICON_TURN]turn or we will break our promise ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
We have promised {1_civname} that we will keep our troops away from their borders ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to keep our troops away from here ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us to keep our troops away from here

{1_civname} has asked us not to spread our religion here ({2_turns}[ICON_TURN])
{1_civname} has asked us not to spread our religion here
Imminent DMZ Promise Breach
We will breach our promise to {1_civname} unless we pull some troops back in {2_turns}[ICON_TURN]turns!
We will breach our promise to {1_civname} unless we pull some troops back IMMEDIATLEY!
